第72届柏林国际电影节(2022)
　　主竞赛单元 最佳短片(提名) 佩德罗·卡贝莱拉

writer.name: 佩德罗·卡贝莱拉 Pedro Cabeleira

director.name: 佩德罗·卡贝莱拉 Pedro Cabeleira

introduction: Márcia is a social media pro and knows all the best poses and filters for perfect selfies. Her son Flávio helps her to take photos of herself. This is how she manages to hook up with famous rapper Da Reel Chullz on Instagram. She is not about to turn him down when he asks her out on a date – even if no one can be found to look after Flávio. A refreshing portrait of a single mother who knows how to work things out.
